snippet: Mr. Drake was an aeronautical engineer who in his spare time developed a version of the sailboard that made windsurfing appealing to a mass market.
abstract: Jim Drake, an aeronautical engineer who helped design the X-15 rocket plane and the Tomahawk Cruise Missile and in his spare time created the Windsurfer, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Drake was an aeronautical engineer who in his spare time developed a version of the sailboard that made windsurfing appealing to a mass market.

headline.seo: Jim Drake, Creator of the Windsurfer, Dies at 83
headline.main: Jim Drake, Creator of the Windsurfer, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Jim Drake, 83, Creator of the Windsurfer
